Limited Time Only!âââââââââââââââââââââââCactus is really an awesome plant to add to your garden or even your office desk top!Cactus Plant Encyclopedia is an application containing detailed information of over 300 types of cactus that are suitable for general conditions. This is probably the most complete and comprehensive Cactus Plant encyclopedia available in the App Market. This App is an excellent app for people who love gardening or for those who are interested in planting a few tiny cactus at your own place. For each type of cactus, the following information is included for easier reference:- High Quality Photo- Common Name- Scientific Name- Minimum Tempurature Required- Blooming Season- Exposure Required- Description and Botanical NotesThe application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.âââââââââââââââââââââââFEATURESThis application has the following features:- 2-Level Category Views with THUMBNAIL preview of each item- All Category View to preview all items in alphabetical order- Single Category View to list items of the same category- Ability to BOOKMARK selected items for easier reference- A cactus name SEARCH engine- OFFLINE browsing âââââââââââââââââââââââThis application is brought to you by Colakey LLC.
